meanings.sent1: That dratted mosquito kept buzzing around my head.
meanings.sent2: The dratted rain ruined our picnic plans.
meanings.sent3: I can't find my keys anywhere, those dratted things always disappear when I need them.
meanings.sent4: The dratted traffic made me late for my appointment, it was like the cars were playing a game of tag.
meanings.sent5: The dratted squeaky door woke me up in the middle of the night, it sounded like a mouse orchestra practicing.

meanings.definition: Used to express annoyance or frustration
meanings.sent1: Dratted! I spilled my juice all over the table.
meanings.sent2: Oh dratted, I forgot to bring my umbrella and now it's pouring outside.
meanings.sent3: Dratted! I accidentally deleted my important email, what a silly mistake.
meanings.sent4: Dratted! The toast burned again, it's like my toaster has a vendetta against me.
meanings.sent5: Dratted! The pen ran out of ink right in the middle of writing my name, talk about bad timing.
